# dtools

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/dtools)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dtools)
[![Lifecycle: stable](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-stable-brightgreen.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#stable)

The goal of `dtools` is to provide useful tools to make data analysis faster and easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tools like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("arturhgq/dtools")
```
## Examples

```{r}
library(dtools)

check_r_pipe(.print = FALSE)
```
